channel.title: 2 problems that i need help on
channel.description:
ok, ive looked and i cant find it.
i want to make it so that when i click on a crate, a tomato comes into your inventory, and when you use that tomato on a player, you throw it at them. how do i do it?
(if there is already a guide to this, just give me a link plz)

item.title: 2 problems that i need help on
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Hey some useful information lol. The kid might need some explaining as of how to write a statement for it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

Ah, ok. (Still learning)

That explains why a command case i used a break in didnt work, eventually i changed it to }…

Ill shut up spamming his thread now lol.

item.title: 2 problems that i need help on
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

You would get the unreachable statement error. Cases are like that; need the breaks.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 problems that i need help on
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

You use brackets much?
use case (id of crate): addItem(tomato, 1); break;

Read full topic
item.source: 2 problems that i need help on

item.title: 2 problems that i need help on
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

case (id of crate):
{
addItem(tomato, 1);
}
break;

You’ve gotta find the case for using an item on a player, find out how it’s written(using an item on a player), and write something so it fits the tomato.

Read full topic
